description: Try our easy to follow Confit Salmon With Watercress Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Confit Salmon With Watercress Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the vinegar and extra virgin olive oil, then season well. Toss with the watercress. Lift the salmon out of the oil and drain on kitchen paper. Serve 2 roasted garlic cloves per person with the watercress salad.
